document.full_text: the united nations has suggested three pesticides and three industrial chemicals be put on a trade "watch list" because they can threaten human health and the environment, the u.n.'s food and agriculture organization said on friday.
document.title: u.n. suggests pesticides, chemicals for watch list
lines_and_colors: the united nations has suggested three pesticides and three industrial chemicals be put on a trade "watch list" because they can threaten human health and the environment, the u.n.'s food and agriculture organization said on friday.
